name: Mission Mental Health Clinic
description: Mission Mental Health Services is a satellite of UCSF, which provides short-term psychotherapy, medication if appropriate, information, and referral to individuals in need of counseling services. Services are offered in English, Spanish, and Portuguese. All San Francisco residents who currently receive mental health services through CBHS, receive public health insurance (Medi-Cal, Healthy SF, etc.) or are uninsured are eligible. Fees are charged on sliding scale, accepts public health insurance
